mapper.insert: insert into wf_track(guid, procrtguid, actrtguid, decide, comments, createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime, finishtime, perfguid, startnumber, agentguid ) values(#GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PROCRTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ACTRTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DECIDE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #COMMENTS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #PERFGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #STARTNUMBER#, #AGENTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.select:
select distinct b.guid, b.procrtguid, b.actrtguid, (select c.title from wf_actrt c where c.guid = b.actrtguid) actrttitle, b.decide, b.comments, b.createuserguid, b.createtime, b.updateuserguid, b.updatetime, b.finishtime, b.perfguid, (select c.deadline from wf_actrt c where c.guid = b.actrtguid) deadline, b.startnumber, (case when m.guid is not null then 'Y' else 'N' end ) hasfile, b.agentguid from wf_track b left join bi_wf_file m on m.activityguid = b.actrtguid and m.startnumber = b.startnumber and m.createuserguid = b.createuserguid
order by b.updatetime, b.decide asc
